Importing and subsetting datafile
```{r}
data <- data.frame(read.csv('datafile.csv'))
data_subset <- subset(data, select = -c(State, RescuerID, Description, PetID))

```

Dropping less useful values in categorical variables:
MaturitySize: dropping 0 = Not Specified
FurLength: dropping 0 = Not Specified
Health: dropping 0 = Not Specified

```{r}
data_subset <- subset(data_subset, MaturitySize = 0, )
```

Questionable to Drop
Vaccinated: dropping 3 = Not Sure


Factorizing the categorical variables

```{r}
data_subset$Gender <- factor(data_subset$Gender, select= c("1", "2"))
data_subset$MaturitySize <- factor(data_subset$MaturitySize, select = c("0", "1", "2", "3", "4"))
data_subset$FurLength <- factor(data_subset$FurLength, select = c("0","1", "2","3"))
data_subset$Vaccinated <- factor(data_subset$Vaccinated, select = c("1", "2"))
```

Creating Cat/Dog subsets
```{r}
cat_subset <- subset(data_subset, Type== 2)
dog_subset <- subset(data_subset, Type== 1)
```
